page.title: 14EATON HALL FARM (Present)
page.content: Eaton Hall farm has been owned by Mr.J.S.Phillips for the past 24 years. As he also owns another farm in Doveridge, Mr. Phillips employs a farm manager who lives on the farm with his wife and family. The farm now covers only 130 acres and there are no longer any milking cows. At present 17 acres of the land are used for growing Barley, 29 acres are used for growing Wheat and the rest is used for grazing beef cattle.The farm contains 8 buildings including the farm house, barn, parlour, crop store and sheds. Many of the buildings are over 100 years old.
